mapper.select: SELECT ID, TITLE, DESCRIPTION, PULLED_DATE, WITHDRAWAL_STATUS, PLAN_ID, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE, DELETED FROM POPUP WHERE ID = #{popupId} AND DELETED = 0

SELECT P.ID, TITLE, CONTENT, DESCRIPTION, PULLED_DATE, WITHDRAWAL_STATUS, PLAN_ID, null, PN.USER_ID, PN.CATEGORY, OPEN_DATE, CLOSE_DATE, NVL2(PC.ID, 1, 0) COLLECTED FROM POPUP P JOIN PLAN PN ON P.PLAN_ID = PN.ID LEFT JOIN POPUP_COLLECTION PC ON P.ID = PC.POPUP_ID AND PC.USER_ID = #{userId} AND PC.DELETED = 0 WHERE P.ID = #{popupId} AND P.DELETED = 0
SELECT ID, TITLE, DESCRIPTION, PULLED_DATE, WITHDRAWAL_STATUS, PLAN_ID, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE, DELETED FROM POPUP WHERE PLAN_ID = #{planId} AND DELETED = 0
WHERE WITHDRAWAL_STATUS != #{withdrawalStatus} AND P.DELETED = 0 ORDER BY PULLED_DATE DESC
WHERE WITHDRAWAL_STATUS != #{withdrawalStatus} AND sysdate BETWEEN OPEN_DATE AND CLOSE_DATE AND P.DELETED = 0 ORDER BY PULLED_DATE DESC
WHERE WITHDRAWAL_STATUS != #{withdrawalStatus} AND sysdate < OPEN_DATE AND P.DELETED = 0 ORDER BY PULLED_DATE DESC

JOIN POPUP_COLLECTION PC ON P.ID = PC.POPUP_ID AND PC.DELETED = 0
WHERE WITHDRAWAL_STATUS != #{withdrawalStatus} AND P.DELETED = 0 ORDER BY PULLED_DATE DESC
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT POPUP_ID, COUNT(*) COUNT FROM POPUP_VIEW GROUP BY POPUP_ID ) PV ON P.ID = PV.POPUP_ID WHERE WITHDRAWAL_STATUS != #{withdrawalStatus} AND P.DELETED = 0 ORDER BY COUNT DESC

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POPUP P, PLAN PL WHERE P.PLAN_ID = PL.ID AND PL.USER_ID = #{userId}) AS TOTAL, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POPUP_ADVERTISEMENT PA, POPUP PU, PLAN PL WHERE PA.POPUP_ID = PU.ID AND PU.PLAN_ID = PL.ID AND PL.USER_ID = #{userId}) AS AD FROM dual
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO POPUP(TITLE, CONTENT, DESCRIPTION, WITHDRAWAL_STATUS, PLAN_ID) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{description}, #{withdrawalStatus}, #{planId})
SELECT NVL(MAX(ID), 0) FROM POPUP
mapper.sql: SELECT P.ID, TITLE, CONTENT, DESCRIPTION, PULLED_DATE, WITHDRAWAL_STATUS, PLAN_ID, PI.URL thumbnail, PN.USER_ID userId, PN.CATEGORY, OPEN_DATE, CLOSE_DATE, 1 FROM POPUP P LEFT JOIN POPUP_IMAGE PI ON P.ID = PI.POPUP_ID AND PI.DELETED = 0 JOIN PLAN PN ON P.PLAN_ID = PN.ID AND PN.DELETED = 0
OFFSET #{pageNo} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{amount} ROWS ONLY
mapper.select: SELECT pl.USER_ID, p.ID as planId, p.TITLE, COUNT(p.ID) AS viewSum FROM POPUP p LEFT JOIN POPUP_VIEW pv ON p.ID = pv.POPUP_ID LEFT JOIN PLAN pl ON p.PLAN_ID = pl.ID LEFT JOIN USERS u ON u.ID = pl.USER_ID WHERE P.DELETED = 0 GROUP BY p.ID, p.TITLE, pl.USER_ID ORDER BY viewSum desc

SELECT ID, TITLE, CONTENT, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE, WITHDRAWAL_STATUS, (SELECT AMOUNT FROM POPUP_ADVERTISEMENT PA WHERE PA.POPUP_ID = P.ID AND DELETED = 0) AMOUNT, (SELECT COUNT(PV.POPUP_ID) FROM POPUP_VIEW PV WHERE PV.POPUP_ID = P.ID AND DELETED = 0) POPUP_VIEW FROM POPUP P WHERE PLAN_ID = #{popupId} AND DELETED = 0
